author: Meghan Moravcik Walbert
title: Do These Two Things Every Time You Rent a Car
description: Many of us are desperate to hit the road and see something—anything—other than the inside of our home this spring. Pair that desperation with a nationwide rental car shortage, and you may be so relieved to actually score a vehicle that you jump in the driver’…
